casebody.data:
Thomas S. COCHRAN, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 12, 1928. No. 76. Baker & Obermeier, of New York City (Leonard J. Obermeier, Oscar S. Rosner, and Alvin S. Rosenson, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Alvin McKinley Sylvester, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
